dct_title_s: Pierhead and bulkead lines, Hudson River, N.Y. & N.J., Castle Point to West New York, N.J., Gansevoort St. to W. 62nd St., N.Y. City
dct_description_sm: Map showing the pierhead and bulkhead lines of various properties along the Hudson River in New York City and West New York, New Jersey, with hand-drawn proposed extensions to these property lines added.
Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection
Proposed extensions added on in drawing, coded in
